name: Scratch Girl
description:
This is a very small but exhilarating game. Players need to control the ship, the black background erased, when the black background is all erased, you can find the hidden miss behind. Be careful not to touch the enemy, otherwise the erased background will be added back again!
Feature:
-10 levels
-3 enemies
-4 characters
-2 items，coin and shield
-cool visual effect
-The feeling of fighting is great
-9 passionate battle music
-Exquisite picture quality
-And more
